name: Cardinality
documentation: Express constraints on the cardinality of container objects which are the values of multiply-valued attributes, including uniqueness and ordering, providing the means to state that a container acts like a logical list, set or bag.

is_ordered.name: is_ordered
is_ordered.documentation: True if the members of the container attribute to which this cardinality refers are ordered.

is_unique.name: is_unique
is_unique.documentation: True if the members of the container attribute to which this cardinality refers are unique.

is_bag.name: is_bag
is_bag.documentation: True if the semantics of this cardinality represent a bag, i.e. unordered, non-unique membership.

is_list.name: is_list
is_list.documentation: True if the semantics of this cardinality represent a list, i.e. ordered, non-unique membership.

is_set.name: is_set
is_set.documentation: True if the semantics of this cardinality represent a set, i.e. unordered, unique membership.
